tool_description: Measures nitrate and nitrite levels in water using colorimetric analysis to assess agricultural contamination and potential health risks from nitrogen compounds.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

compound_type.description: Nitrogen compound to test: nitrate, nitrite, or both

error_messages: Invalid compound type: Must be one of [nitrate, nitrite, both]
Sample turbidity interference: High turbidity affects colorimetric readings
Color interference: Sample color interferes with analysis
Reaction time exceeded: Test results invalid due to timing error
usage: Provide sample ID and specify which nitrogen compounds to test. Ensure sample is clear and follow timing requirements precisely for accurate colorimetric analysis.

total_nitrogen.description: Combined nitrate and nitrite as total nitrogen

health_risk_level.description: Health risk assessment based on concentrations
